name: MJDiscord
author: DeveloperCats
description: Generate images using MidJourney's API through Discord bot commands
install_msg: Thanks for installing MJDiscord! Use `[p]mjset apikey` to configure your MidJourney API credentials.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores MidJourney API credentials for the bot owner. No end-user data is stored.
